instructions: 1 Tap the Letgo app icon. The app icon is a pink square with "letgo" written in white inside. You can find this on either your homescreen, the app drawer, or by searching. 2 Tap your profile picture. This is in the upper left of your screen. 3 Tap or on the review the seller left for you. You cannot create a review for the seller until they create a review about you, the buyer. A drop-down list will appear. 4 Tap . 5 Tap the star you want to rate that seller. If you tap the 2nd star, you ll be giving that seller a 2-star rating. Leaving a comment is optional, but this will be visible along with the star rating. 6 Tap . This finalizes and publishes your review. Advertisement

1 Tap the Letgo app icon. The app icon is a pink square with "letgo" written in white inside. You can find this on either your home screen, the app drawer, or by searching. 2 Tap your profile picture. This is in the upper left of your screen. 3 Tap . This is near the bottom of the page. 4 Tap . This will open a new tab with all your recent transactions. 5 Tap the purchase you want to leave feedback on. All details of the sale will appear. 6 Tap the star you want to rate that buyer. If you tap the 2nd star, you ll be giving that buyer a 2-star rating. Leaving a comment is optional, but this will be visible along with the star rating. 7 Tap . This finalizes and publishes your review. Advertisement
